Class PokemonArena

  • java.lang.Object
    • PokemonArena

  • public class PokemonArena
extends java.lang.Object
    PokemonArena.java The PokemonArena Game. ICS4U. A pokemon game with only battle-ing stuff.
    Author:
    Charles-Jianye Chen
    See Also:
    PickPokemonConsole

      • parseRaw

        public static Pokemon parseRaw(java.lang.String raw)
        Parses String repr of a Pokemon instance into a Pokemon instance.
        Parameters:
        raw - String repr. of Pokemon.
        Returns:
        the newly generated Pokemon.
        See Also:
        loadPokemons(java.lang.String)

      • loadPokemons

        public static Pokemon[] loadPokemons(java.lang.String fname)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Load String repr of Pokemon instances from a file.

        File Format:

        Line 1: num of entries

        The following lines: name, hp, type, resistance, weakness, numattacks, numattacks*[attackname, energycost, damage, special]

        Parameters:
        fname - the file's name which contains the String repr. of Pokemon instances.
        Returns:
        an array of the Pokemon instances generated from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the it occurs while opening the file.

      • toArrayList

        public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> toArrayList(T[] objectArray)
        Convert an object array into an ArrayList of the instances.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the object array.
        Parameters:
        objectArray - the array which is going to be transformed.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of the instances in the array.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • nextpokemon

        public static java.lang.String nextpokemon(Player player)
        Calls pickpokemons(ArrayList, int[]) to fetch the Pokemon indx of the selection.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player object which contains the pokemons to be selected.
        Returns:
        the String repr. of an indx.

      • nextaction

        public static java.lang.String nextaction(Player player)
        Asks the user to select their next action.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player who needs the next action.
        Returns:
        the String repr of the next action: Battle.ACTION, param

      • pickpokemons

        public static void pickpokemons(java.util.ArrayList<Pokemon> pokemons,
                                int[] selections)
        This method creates a console and asks user to input a total amount of (selection.length) non-rep pokemons.

        This method does not allow "retn" to happen.

        Parameters:
        pokemons - the arraylist containing pokemons to select.
        selections - the array for storing (returning) indx (length must be specified).
        See Also:
        PickPokemonConsole

      • pickpokemons

        public static int pickpokemons(java.util.ArrayList<Pokemon> pokemons)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates a console and asks user to input one pokemon selection.

        This method does allow "retn" to happen.

        Parameters:
        pokemons - the arraylist containing pokemons to select.
        Returns:
        the indx of the selection.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a "retn" is received from the console.
        See Also:
        PickPokemonConsole
